page.title: 01GENERAL SYNOPSIS OF AREA
page.content: The{Hulland Ward D-Block (grid ref. {04240345)}includes the parishes of Hulland Village,Hulland Ward, Millington Green,parts of Hulland Ward Intakes,Biggin and Ireton Wood, covering an area of{1200 hectares.}The area is rural containing much farmland cultivated on a gravel/sand soil.There are some woodland and bush areas.Hulland Village is the older part of the area with its own Hall,Church and Chapel. Some cottages and houses have been renovated and converted.Hulland Ward has a long main street with shops and garages.There has been a new developmemt of bungalows and houses off the main road together with a new primary school. Population(1981 census) {HULLAND VILLAGE :200 :70 households {HULLAND WARD :1015:360 households {MILLINGTON GREEN:60 :22 households
